Sueki Suezo: The FAQ
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): FAQ: The Most Important Game Data: The /??? Breeds: Sueki Suezo: The FAQ
By Lisa Shock on Saturday, August 18, 2001 - 08:01 pm:

How do I find Sueki Suezo?
This monster is found, if you are using the NTSC North American version of MR2, on the Monster Rancher game disc. If you are playing the PAL (European/Australian) version, look for a CD by Aqua called Aquarius, the Australian pressing works, see the CD list. (The US "Aquarius" appears to not work.)

Does it really live just one week?
Yes -unless you send it on errantry, then it dies after completing the 4th week.

Can I feed it food or an item?
No it will not accept an item or food.

What is it good for?
*You can speed up the process of unlocking certain breeds by raising one. See the FAQ thread "How To Unlock All 38" for more details.
*You can also enter it in tournaments to win some cash. It can make money in the free-for-alls, and C level tourneys.

What are its stats?

9993403403001999


Has: Tail Assault, Spit, Bite
